ticket.title: Cannot set :content_type on render :update
ticket.original-body:
ActionController::Base completely ignores the `:content_type` attribute on this call:
@@@ render :update, :content_type => "text/html" do ... end @@@
Yes, it's a very strange thing to do, but is necessary when using the iframe hack to do AJAX file uploads. If content/type is set to javascript, the browser escapes the html inside javascript. See http://malsup.com/jquery/form/#file-upload for more information.
